comments.body: is it necessary to test again with series? since it delegates to the array

I thought so too. When checking the implementation for `IntegerArray`, it tests in both array and series so I thought I was missing something and just followed suit. If it's determined that the tests are redundant, we should remove the redundant tests from `IntegerArray` as well.

okay then let's follow the integer EA case

these tests could be consolidated too, i think (and possibly merged with the integer tests?)
added another fixture and consolidated all the unary operator tests. I also consolidated the tests for integers
